price: To, idan sun jũya, sai ka ce: Ma'ishĩna Allah ne. Bãbu abin bautãwa fãce shi. A gare Shi nake dõgara. Kuma Shi ne Ubangijin Al'arshi mai girma.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَقُلۡ حَسۡبِيَ ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw faqul ḥasbiya al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa ʿalayhi tawakkaltu wahuwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
